document_data.name: Shartana
document_data.mainbody: '''Shartana''' was a [[human]] woman of the city of [[Calaunt]] in [[the Vast]] in the mid–14th century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Shadowcloaks]] [[thieves]] [[guild]].
document_data.Description: Shartana was tall with green eyes and jet black hair. She had a soft voice described as "venomous".
document_data.Possessions: As a Shadowcloak, Shartana possessed the [[shadowcloak (cloak)|''shadowcloak'']] that all members wore.
document_data.History: When the Shadowcloaks ambushed, pursued and finally trapped [[Andreas Vanderslyke]] and [[Honus]] in a room, Shartana was there with dozen Shadowcloaks. Shartana conducted a mock trial for the renegade thief Honus and Andreas too. Andreas recognized Shartana and knew her to be a member of the Shadowcloaks.
